purpose: Enable developers to build scalable and stateful serverless applications with ease.
principle: Builds on serverless architecture using Cloudflare Durable Objects to manage state across distributed systems, providing a seamless experience for real-time applications.
reusability: Offers APIs and integrations for easy deployment and scaling of stateful applications, with support for popular game engines and cloud platforms.
limitations: Primarily focused on Cloudflare infrastructure, may require adaptation for other cloud providers.
name: rivet
highlight: Serverless platform optimized for stateful backend applications, leveraging Cloudflare Durable Objects for state management.
